title: (x) Lidt for Lækker - hand-lettered by Allan Daastrup {Rainer, Shahab G}
content:
Hello,

I've seen this pretty good looking script font on an ad in Copenhagen.  
Any help regarding identification is welcome.

Cheers

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329013905im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lidtforlaekker_4300.jpg)
author: dogmatheque

comments.content: As every duplicate letter is diferent I’d say it is handlettered.

The type is indeed handmade. This piece was commissioned for a campaign, [http://www.lidtforlaekker.dk](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329013905/http:/www.lidtforlaekker.dk/), for a fitness chain here in Denmark. The type is made by Allan Daastrup of [http://www. typesunited.dk](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329013905/http:/www.%20typesunited.dk).
